meanings.sent1: She goes to the gym regularly to stay healthy.

meanings.sent1: The bakery regularly sells fresh bread in the morning.
meanings.sent2: He regularly brushes his teeth before going to bed.
meanings.sent3: The cat regularly knocks things off the table just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The old clock chimes regularly, marking the passage of time.
